title: What's the dumbest thing you've heard in ranked?
body:
I had a Sivir rage at me and mute me (and threaten to report me) because I told her she can buy QSS to remove Malz's suppression. She legit said "no you can't." I said "yes you can." She said "muted, reported" and went on to die to Malz over and over. Or you could just not walk into range of Malz in the first place. That's when I was gold 5 in s3, the good ole days.

I was also once told in diamond last season that Nasus' wither is a great ability to initiate. By a leona. Yeah. Boosted? Or just average support main?
